field.label: ARP priority level
field.help: This defines the relative importance of a resource request to allow in deciding whether a new QoS Flow may be accepted or needs to be rejected in the case of resource limitations

field.label: Pre-emption Capability
field.help: This defines whether a service data flow may get resources that were already assigned to another service data flow with a lower ARP priority leve

field.label: Pre-emption Vulnerability
field.help: defines whether a service data flow may lose the resources assigned to it in order to admit a service data flow with higher ARP priority level
